trans-unit.source: Represents an Entity Data Model (EDM) to data-bound controls in an ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 表示实体数据模型 (EDM) 向 ASP.NET 应用程序中的数据绑定控件。

trans-unit.source: In this topic: - [Introduction](#introduction) - [Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## Introduction You can use the EntityDataSource control together with a data-bound control to retrieve data from an EDM and to display, edit, and sort data on a Web page by using little or no code.
trans-unit.target: 本主题中:-[简介](#introduction) - [声明性语法](#declarative_syntax) # # 介绍你可以使用 EntityDataSource 控件的数据绑定控件以及从 EDM 中检索数据，若要显示，请编辑，并通过使用很少或没有代码在网页上的数据进行排序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [EntityDataSource Web Server Control Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[EntityDataSource Web 服务器控件概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## Declarative Syntax ```                                                                         ```
trans-unit.target: # # 声明性语法```                                                                         ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> class with the provided connection.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref>类提供的连接。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref> to the Entity Data Model (EDM).
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"> </xref>到实体数据模型 (EDM)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control dynamically creates an ORDER BY clause based on values in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderByParameters*> collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref>控件动态创建 ORDER BY 子句中的值为基础的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderByParameters*>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderByParameters*>

trans-unit.source: When the AutoGenerateOrderByClause property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> control is set to `true`, the control automatically generates an ORDER BY clause from the parameter in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection> assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderByParameters%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 时的 AutoGenerateOrderByClause 属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>控件设置为`true`，该控件自动生成 ORDER BY 子句中的参数从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection>分配给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderByParameters%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderByParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>

trans-unit.source: This eliminates the need to explicitly assign an ORDER BY clause to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 这消除了需要显式将分配到 ORDER BY 子句<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the AutoGenerateOrderByClause property to `true`, you should not explicitly assign a value to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果 AutoGenerateOrderByClause 属性设置为`true`，你应显式将值赋给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control creates the ORDER BY clause; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref>控件创建的 ORDER BY 子句; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When the AutoGenerateOrderByClause property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy*> property is not null.
trans-unit.target: 当 AutoGenerateOrderByClause 属性设置为<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy*>属性不为 null。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control dynamically creates a WHERE clause based on values defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.WhereParameters*> collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref>控件动态创建 WHERE 子句中定义的值为基础的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.WhereParameters*>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.WhereParameters*>

trans-unit.source: To filter query results by equating an entity type property to an expression, you can use the AutoGenerateWhereClause property.
trans-unit.target: 若要通过使实体类型属性等于表达式筛选查询结果，你可以使用 AutoGenerateWhereClause 属性。

trans-unit.source: When the AutoGenerateWhereClause property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> control is set to `true`, the control automatically generates a `WHERE` clause from the parameters in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection> of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.WhereParameters%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 时的 AutoGenerateWhereClause 属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>控件设置为`true`，该控件自动生成`WHERE`子句中的参数从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection>的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.WhereParameters%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.WhereParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A> property of each parameter has to match an entity type property name that is included in the query results.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A>每个参数的属性必须与匹配查询结果中包含的实体类型属性名。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the AutoGenerateWhereClause property to `true`, you should not explicitly assign a `WHERE` clause to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Where%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果 AutoGenerateWhereClause 属性设置为`true`，您应显式分配`WHERE`子句<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Where%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Where%2A>

trans-unit.source: Example In the following example the AutoGenerateWhereClause property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 示例在下面的示例 AutoGenerateWhereClause 属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A> of the property has to match an entity type property name that is included in the query results.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A>的属性必须与匹配查询结果中包含的实体类型属性名。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: The query selects the SalesOrderID and TotalDue properties of the SalesOrderHeader entity type.
trans-unit.target: 查询选择 SalesOrderHeader 实体类型的 SalesOrderID 和 TotalDue 属性。

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated `WHERE` clause will filter the query results by comparing the TotalDue value to a value selected in the TotalDueList list box control.
trans-unit.target: 自动生成`WHERE`子句将通过比较 TotalDue 值与在 TotalDueList 列表框控件中选择的值来筛选查询结果。

trans-unit.source: ``` <asp:EntityDataSource ID="SalesOrderHeaderWithAutoParam" runat="server" ConnectionString="name=AdventureWorksEntities" DefaultContainerName="AdventureWorksEntities" EntitySetName="SalesOrderHeaders" Select="it.SalesOrderID, it.TotalDue" AutoGenerateWhereClause="True"> <WhereParameters> <asp:ControlParameter ControlID="TotalDueList" Name="TotalDue" PropertyName="SelectedValue" DbType="Decimal" /> </WhereParameters> </asp:EntityDataSource> ``` ## Example By default, the AutoGenerateWhereClause property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: ``` <asp:EntityDataSource ID="SalesOrderHeaderWithAutoParam" runat="server" ConnectionString="name=AdventureWorksEntities" DefaultContainerName="AdventureWorksEntities" EntitySetName="SalesOrderHeaders" Select="it.SalesOrderID, it.TotalDue" AutoGenerateWhereClause="True"> <WhereParameters> <asp:ControlParameter ControlID="TotalDueList" Name="TotalDue" PropertyName="SelectedValue" DbType="Decimal" /> </WhereParameters> </asp:EntityDataSource> ```# # 示例︰ 默认情况下，AutoGenerateWhereClause 属性设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: This means that we have to supply the `WHERE` clause.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着，我们必须提供`WHERE`子句。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the `WHERE` clause is `Where="it.TotalDue < @totalDueParam"` and totalDueParam is the parameter name.
trans-unit.target: 在下面的示例中，`WHERE`子句是`Where="it.TotalDue < @totalDueParam"`和 totalDueParam 是参数名称。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control creates the WHERE clause; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref>控件创建 WHERE 子句; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When the AutoGenerateWhereClause property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Where*> property is not null.
trans-unit.target: 当 AutoGenerateWhereClause 属性设置为<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Where*>属性不为 null。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Where*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control supports navigation through sections of the data at run time.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref>控件支持在运行时各部分的数据进行导航。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> control supports automatically paging through the data returned by queries.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>控件支持自动分页查询返回的数据。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The AutoPage property is a Boolean property that indicates whether paging is enabled for data that is returned by queries bound to data controls.
trans-unit.target: 自动创建数据页属性是布尔值属性，该值指示是否为绑定到数据控件的查询所返回的数据启用了分页。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> control adds the appropriate query builder methods to the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> based on the information supplied to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView> by the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为`true`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>控件添加到相应的查询生成器方法<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>根据的信息提供给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView>由数据绑定控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView> </xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The value of the AutoPage property determines whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView.CanPage%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView> control that supports the data source is `true` or `false`.
trans-unit.target: 自动创建数据页属性的值确定是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView.CanPage%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView>支持数据源的控件是`true`或`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView.CanPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you define a projection with paging enabled, you must define the property by which to order the results.
trans-unit.target: 当使用启用的分页定义投影时，必须定义对结果进行排序依据的属性。

trans-unit.source: This means that when you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Select%2A> property to define a projection and have AutoPage set to `true`, you must also set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy%2A> property to define the order or set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.AutoGenerateOrderByClause%2A> property to `true` and add an ORDER BY parameter to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderByParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着，当你设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Select%2A>属性来定义投影和具有设置为自动创建的数据页`true`，还必须设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy%2A>属性来定义的顺序或设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.AutoGenerateOrderByClause%2A>属性`true`和 ORDER BY 将参数添加到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderByParameters%2A>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderByParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.AutoGenerateOrderByClause%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user can page through the data; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果用户可以通过数据; 页，否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control supports sorting the data at run time.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref>控件支持对数据进行排序在运行时。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> control supports automatically sorting the data returned by queries.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>控件支持自动对查询返回的数据进行排序。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The AutoSort property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> control is a Boolean property that indicates whether sorting is enabled for data that is returned by queries that are bound to data controls.
trans-unit.target: 自动排序属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>控件是布尔值属性，该值指示是否为绑定到数据控件的查询所返回的数据启用排序。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> control adds the appropriate query builder methods to the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> based on the information supplied to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView> by the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为`true`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>控件添加到相应的查询生成器方法<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>根据的信息提供给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView>由数据绑定控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView> </xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The value of the AutoSort property determines whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView.CanSort%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView.CanRetrieveTotalRowCount%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView> control that supports the data source is `true` or `false`.
trans-unit.target: 自动排序属性的值确定是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView.CanSort%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView.CanRetrieveTotalRowCount%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView>支持数据源的控件是`true`或`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView.CanRetrieveTotalRowCount%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView.CanSort%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user can sort the data; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果用户可以将数据; 进行排序，否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the parameter collection for the query.
trans-unit.target: 获取查询的参数集合。

trans-unit.source: The CommandParameters property is used to access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection> of parameters that are passed to an explicit Entity SQL query that is specified using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.CommandText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用的 CommandParameters 属性访问<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection>到使用指定的显式 Entity SQL 查询传递的参数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.CommandText%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.CommandText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection"></xref> that contains the parameters that are passed to the query command.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection"> </xref>包含传递给查询命令的参数。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an Entity SQL command that defines the query.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置定义查询的 Entity SQL 命令。

trans-unit.source: The CommandText property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> control enables you to specify a query that uses a custom Entity SQL expression.
trans-unit.target: CommandText 属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>控制，你可以指定使用的自定义的 Entity SQL 表达式的查询。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>

trans-unit.source: Like the SELECT statement, CommandText creates a projection of the original data that is not updatable.
trans-unit.target: 与 SELECT 语句中，类似 CommandText 创建不是可更新的原始数据的投影。

trans-unit.source: When the CommandText property is assigned, update, insert, and delete functionalities are disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果分配 CommandText 属性，将禁用更新、 插入和删除功能。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the methods <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView.CanDelete%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView.CanInsert%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView.CanUpdate%2A> of the related <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView> control all return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView.CanDelete%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView.CanInsert%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView.CanUpdate%2A>将相关<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView>控件都返回`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView.CanUpdate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView.CanInsert%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView.CanDelete%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the CommandText property is set, an exception is thrown when the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%2A> method is called by a control that is data bound to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> control if the value of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EnableInsert%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EnableUpdate%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EnableDelete%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 当设置 CommandText 属性时，将引发异常时<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%2A>方法由数据绑定到某个控件调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>如果控制的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EnableInsert%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EnableUpdate%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EnableDelete%2A>设置为`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EnableDelete%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EnableUpdate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EnableInsert%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the CommandText is set to a query that returns a projection of properties (for example, "`SELECT p.ProductID, p. Name FROM AdventureWorksEntities.Products AS p`"), a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataRecord> will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 CommandText 设置为返回的属性投影的查询 (例如，"`SELECT p.ProductID, p. Name FROM AdventureWorksEntities.Products AS p`")、 一个<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataRecord>将返回。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataRecord>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that is the Entity SQL query.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>是 Entity SQL 查询的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the connection string that is used to execute the query.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于执行查询的连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: The ConnectionString property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> control can be initialized from a named EDM connection string stored in the element of the application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: ConnectionString 属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>可以从存储在应用程序配置文件的元素的命名 EDM 连接字符串初始化控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>

trans-unit.source: When the EDM is created by using the Entity Data Model Wizard, a named EDM connection is created in the application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: EDM 由使用实体数据模型向导创建的是在应用程序配置文件中创建命名的 EDM 连接。

trans-unit.source: When a named EDM connection string is found in the application configuration file, the connection is visible as an option in the Configure Data Source wizard of the EntityDataSource designer.
trans-unit.target: 在应用程序配置文件中找到命名的 EDM 连接字符串，则连接时，显示为 EntityDataSource 设计器中配置数据源向导的一个选项。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Configure Data Source Wizard (EntityDataSource Control)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/263976a5-2406-47c0-8919-c6af6e76d78e).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[数据源配置向导 （EntityDataSource 控件）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/263976a5-2406-47c0-8919-c6af6e76d78e)。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.ContextTypeName%2A> property is not specified, both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.DefaultContainerName%2A> and ConnectionString properties must be set for the control to create the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.ContextTypeName%2A>未指定属性，这两个的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.DefaultContainerName%2A>并且 ConnectionString 属性必须设置为控件创建<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext>.</xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.DefaultContainerName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.ContextTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The connection string for the query.

trans-unit.source: The ContextCreated event allows you to assign the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> that has been created to a variable for successive operations outside the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>.
trans-unit.target: ContextCreated 事件允许您将分配<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext>给变量<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>之外的后续操作以便创建</xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceContextCreatedEventArgs.Context%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property contains the context that has been created in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.ContextCreating> event.

trans-unit.source: If the user does not assign a context during the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.ContextCreating> event, the context instance contained in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceContextCreatedEventArgs.Context%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is the one created by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> based on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.ContextTypeName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.DefaultContainerName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.ConnectionString%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户不会分配期间上下文<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.ContextCreating>上下文实例中包含的事件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceContextCreatedEventArgs.Context%2A?displayProperty=fullName>是通过创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>基于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.ContextTypeName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.DefaultContainerName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.ConnectionString%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.ConnectionString%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.DefaultContainerName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.ContextTypeName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceContextCreatedEventArgs.Context%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.ContextCreating>

trans-unit.target: 已从数据源中删除对象后发生。

trans-unit.source: The Deleted event is raised after the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges%2A> method has just been successfully called on the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> to delete an object.
trans-unit.target: 已删除事件引发之后<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges%2A>方法只需成功在调用了<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext>删除对象。</xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> </xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.Entity%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs> object is used to access the deleted object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.Entity%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs>对象用于访问已删除的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.Entity%2A>

trans-unit.source: This object is in a <xref:System.Data.EntityState> state.
trans-unit.target: 此对象处于<xref:System.Data.EntityState>状态。</xref:System.Data.EntityState>

trans-unit.source: If an error occurs when an object is deleted, the Deleted event is raised, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.Exception%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs> object is set to the returned <xref:System.Exception>, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.Entity%2A> property is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果删除某个对象时，将出现错误，将引发已删除事件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.Exception%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs>对象设置为返回<xref:System.Exception>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.Entity%2A>属性设置为`null`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.Entity%2A> </xref:System.Exception> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you handle the exception in the Deleted event handler, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果处理已删除事件处理程序中的异常，设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>属性`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: This prevents the exception from being raised again.
trans-unit.target: 这可防止再次引发异常。

trans-unit.source: When you specify a value of `false` for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> re-raises the exception.
trans-unit.target: 当指定的值`false`为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>重新引发异常。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of parameters that are used during a delete operation.
trans-unit.target: 获取在删除操作过程中使用的参数的集合。

trans-unit.source: For web applications that target ASP.NET 4 or earlier, the property value is stored in view state and is automatically maintained between postbacks.
trans-unit.target: 对于面向 ASP.NET 4 或更早版本的 web 应用程序，属性值存储在视图状态，并自动维护之间回发。

trans-unit.source: For web applications that target ASP.NET 4.5, the property value is not stored in view state, and you must set the value for each HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 对于 web 应用程序面向 ASP.NET 4.5，该属性值不存储视图状态中，必须设置为每个 HTTP 请求的值。

trans-unit.source: The parameters that are used during a delete operation.
trans-unit.target: 在删除操作期间使用的参数。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before an object is deleted from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 从数据源中删除一个对象之前发生。

trans-unit.source: The Deleting event is raised before the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges%2A> method is called on the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> to delete an object.
trans-unit.target: 删除事件之前，将引发<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges%2A>方法调用<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext>删除对象。</xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> </xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.Entity%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs> object is used to access the object to be deleted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.Entity%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs>对象用于访问要删除的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.Entity%2A>

trans-unit.source: The properties of this object may not be fully set.
trans-unit.target: 此对象的属性不能完全设置。

trans-unit.source: Only the properties required to identify the object must be set.
trans-unit.target: 必须设置仅需标识对象的属性。

trans-unit.source: To stop the object from being deleted, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要停止在被删除的对象，设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs>对象传递给`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: If an error occurs when preparing to delete an object, the Deleting event is raised and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.Exception%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs> object is set to the returned <xref:System.Exception>.

trans-unit.source: When you handle the exception in the Deleting event handler, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property to `true`.

trans-unit.source: This prevents the exception from being raised again.

trans-unit.source: The EntitySetName property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> control is used to specify the entity set of the type of the objects that are accessed by the control.
trans-unit.target: EntitySetName 属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>控件用于指定由控件访问的对象的类型的实体集。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The value of the EntitySetName property is the default SELECT statement that is used by the control.
trans-unit.target: EntitySetName 属性的值是由该控件的默认选择语句。

trans-unit.source: The setting is not required if the query is specified as an Entity SQL expression that is supplied to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.CommandText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果查询指定为 Entity SQL 表达式，用于提供给不需要的设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.CommandText%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.CommandText%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Custom Command Text (EntityDataSource)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d42e90d0-1443-474e-8940-53f504d6fc91).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[自定义命令文本 (EntityDataSource)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d42e90d0-1443-474e-8940-53f504d6fc91)。

trans-unit.source: The entity set name.
trans-unit.target: 实体集名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the expression that limits the query to only results of a specific derived type.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置将查询限制为仅特定的派生类型的结果的表达式。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> control must return a specific derived type, the EntityTypeFilter property must also be set to specify the name of this derived type.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>控件必须返回特定的派生的类型、 EntityTypeFilter 属性还必须设置为指定此派生类型的名称。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EntitySetName%2A> property specifies an entity set that can generate polymorphic results, the EntityTypeFilter property is required to be able to edit data.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EntitySetName%2A>属性指定的实体集，可以生成多态结果，因此 EntityTypeFilter 属性需要能够编辑数据。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EntitySetName%2A>

trans-unit.source: This has the same effect as applying the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.OfType%2A> method to the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>.
trans-unit.target: 这具有相同的效果与将应用<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.OfType%2A>到<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>。</xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>方法</xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.OfType%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the data binding is read-only, then the EntityTypeFilter property is not required.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据绑定是只读的然后 EntityTypeFilter 属性不是必需的。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the properties of the object returned by the query will be those of the default entity type for theentity set.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，由查询返回的对象的属性将这些实体集的默认实体类型。

trans-unit.source: The filter expression.
trans-unit.target: 筛选器表达式中。

trans-unit.source: Gets the named data source view that is associated with the data source control.
trans-unit.target: 获取与数据源控件相关联的已命名的数据源视图。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> control supports only one data source view.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>控件支持只有一个数据源视图。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>

trans-unit.source: Like all data source view objects, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView> object that is associated with the data source control defines its capabilities, performs all work that is necessary to retrieve data from the underlying database, and performs operations, such as sorting, inserting, deleting, and updating.
trans-unit.target: 像所有的数据源视图对象一样<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView>与数据源控件相关联的对象定义其功能、 执行的所有工作，必须从基础数据库中，检索数据，都执行操作，例如排序、 插入、 删除和更新。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: The name of the view to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要检索的视图名称。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control supports only one view, `viewName` is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref>控件仅支持一个视图，`viewName`将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView"> </xref>关联<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.target: 获取与关联的名称表示的视图对象的列表集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> control supports only one view on its underlying data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>控件仅支持一个视图针对其基础数据。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The GetViewNames method returns a single-element collection of this one-view name as a string.
trans-unit.target: GetViewNames 方法返回一个此一个视图名的字符串形式的单个元素集合。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> that contains the names of the views associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>，它包含与关联的视图名称<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref>控件。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Entity SQL expression that specifies how to group the query results.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置指定如何查询结果进行分组的 Entity SQL 表达式。

trans-unit.source: The GROUP BY clause.
trans-unit.target: GROUP BY 子句中。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the expression that specifies the related objects to include in the query results.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置指定要包括在查询结果中的相关的对象的表达式。

trans-unit.source: The Include property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> control specifies a comma-separated list of query paths that define the objects thatare returned together with the specifically queried object.
trans-unit.target: 包括属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>控件指定逗号分隔的定义以及专门查询的对象返回对象 thatare 的查询路径列表。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>

trans-unit.source: Each comma-separated value in the string is passed, without modification, as a separate call to the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Include%2A> method of an <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> that is executed by the [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/add/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 字符串中的每个以逗号分隔值传递，而不进行修改，作为单独调用<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Include%2A>方法<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>通过执行[!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/add/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]。</xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> </xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Include%2A>

trans-unit.source: This query is the source of the data regulated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 此查询是通过调整的数据源<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The Include property is the argument applied to the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> before it is executed.
trans-unit.target: 包括属性是应用于参数<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>执行之前。</xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>

trans-unit.source: The string supplied to the Include property uses the same format as the string that is passed to the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Include%2A> method of <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>.
trans-unit.target: 提供到包含属性的字符串使用相同的格式为字符串的字符串传递给<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Include%2A><xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>.</xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>方法</xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Include%2A>

trans-unit.source: For examples of how to use query paths to automatically load related objects, see [How to: Use Query Paths to Shape Results](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/100bf7f5-00ba-4c17-8e27-7a8a14831093).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何使用查询路径以自动加载相关的对象的示例，请参阅[如何︰ 使用查询路径形状结果](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/100bf7f5-00ba-4c17-8e27-7a8a14831093)。

trans-unit.source: When the Include property is used to specify query paths, the properties of the related entities can only be used for read-only data-binding.
trans-unit.target: 当包含属性用于指定查询路径时，将相关实体的属性可以仅用于只读数据绑定。

trans-unit.source: If related objects are not explicitly included in the query path, the property descriptors are still available for data binding, but the properties themselves return null values.
trans-unit.target: 如果相关的对象未显式包括在查询路径中，属性描述符仍可用于数据绑定，但属性本身返回 null 值。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the related objects must be explicitly loaded to display their values.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，必须显式加载相关的对象以显示其值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Loading Related Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[加载相关对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1)。

trans-unit.source: Comma-separated list of query paths to return in the query results.
trans-unit.target: 查询路径在查询结果中返回以逗号分隔列表。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after a new object is created at the data source.
trans-unit.target: 在数据源创建一个新的对象后发生。

trans-unit.source: The Inserted event is raised when the added object is created in the data source or if an error has occurred when the object data is persisted to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 添加的对象创建数据源中时，或出现错误的对象数据保留到数据源时，将引发插入事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.Entity%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs> object is used to access the added object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.Entity%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs>对象用于访问添加的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.Entity%2A>

trans-unit.source: The properties of this object contain values that are returned from the data source, including any data source-generated values.
trans-unit.target: 此对象的属性包含从数据源，包括任何数据源生成的值返回的值。

trans-unit.source: If an error occurs when an object is persisted to the data source, the Inserted event is raised and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.Exception%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs> object is set to the returned <xref:System.Exception>.
trans-unit.target: 如果对象持久保留到数据源时，将出现错误，将引发插入事件和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.Exception%2A>属性的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs>对象设置为返回<xref:System.Exception>。</xref:System.Exception> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you handle the exception in the Inserted event handler, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果处理插入事件处理程序中的异常，设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>属性`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: This prevents the exception from being raised again.
trans-unit.target: 这可防止再次引发异常。

trans-unit.source: When you specify a value of `false` for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> re-raises the exception.
trans-unit.target: 当指定的值`false`为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>重新引发异常。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: 一个新的对象保存到数据源之前发生。

trans-unit.source: The Inserting event is raised before a new object is persisted to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 一个新的对象保留到数据源之前，将引发插入事件。

trans-unit.source: The Inserting event enables you to modify or verify the object being added, add a different object, or cancel the operation.
trans-unit.target: 插入事件，可修改或验证所添加的对象、 添加的其他对象或取消该操作。

trans-unit.source: You can access the object to be added from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.Entity%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: 你可以访问该对象添加从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.Entity%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.Entity%2A>

trans-unit.source: If supplying a different object, the user is responsible for setting the correct entity type in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.Entity%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了另一个对象，用户将负责在中设置正确的实体类型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.Entity%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.Entity%2A>

trans-unit.source: To stop the object from being added, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要停止从所添加的对象，设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs>对象传递给`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: If an error occurs when creating a new object, the Inserting event is raised and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.Exception%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs> object is set to the returned <xref:System.Exception>.
trans-unit.target: 如果创建新对象时出错，将引发插入事件和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.Exception%2A>属性的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs>对象设置为返回<xref:System.Exception>。</xref:System.Exception> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you handle the exception in the Inserting event handler, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 处理插入事件处理程序中的异常时，设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>属性`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: This prevents the exception from being raised again.
trans-unit.target: 这可防止再次引发异常。

trans-unit.source: When you specify a value of `false` for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> re-raises the exception.
trans-unit.target: 当指定的值`false`为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>重新引发异常。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: For web applications that target ASP.NET 4 or earlier, the property value is stored in view state and is automatically maintained between postbacks.
trans-unit.target: 对于面向 ASP.NET 4 或更早版本的 web 应用程序，属性值存储在视图状态，并自动维护之间回发。

trans-unit.source: For web applications that target ASP.NET 4.5, the property value is not stored in view state, and you must set the value for each HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 对于 web 应用程序面向 ASP.NET 4.5，该属性值不存储视图状态中，必须设置为每个 HTTP 请求的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Entity SQL expression that specifies how to order the query results.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置指定如何查询结果进行排序的 Entity SQL 表达式。

trans-unit.source: The OrderBy property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> control is a string that represents an expression of an Entity SQL query.
trans-unit.target: OrderBy 属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>控件是一个字符串，表示实体 SQL 查询的表达式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>

trans-unit.source: This string is passed, without modification, to an <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> that is executed by the [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/add/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此字符串而不进行修改，即传递到<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>通过执行[!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/add/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]。</xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>

trans-unit.source: This query is the source of the data regulated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 此查询是通过调整的数据源<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The string supplied to the OrderBy property uses the same format as the string that is passed to the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.OrderBy%2A> method of <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>.
trans-unit.target: 提供给 OrderBy 属性的字符串使用相同的格式为字符串的字符串传递给<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.OrderBy%2A><xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>.</xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>方法</xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.OrderBy%2A>

trans-unit.source: For examples of how to use the clause to order query results, see [How to: Sort Data](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/c05f2506-cb9d-4ebc-822b-300042ad53e7).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何使用对查询结果进行排序的子句的示例，请参阅[如何︰ 对数据进行排序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/c05f2506-cb9d-4ebc-822b-300042ad53e7)。

trans-unit.source: The ORDER BY clause.
trans-unit.target: ORDER BY 子句中。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of parameters that are used to create the ORDER BY clause.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于创建 ORDER BY 子句的参数的集合。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.AutoGenerateOrderByClause%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> control is set to `true`, the control automatically generates an ORDER BY clause from the parameter in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection> assigned to the OrderByParameters property.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.AutoGenerateOrderByClause%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>控件设置为`true`，该控件自动生成 ORDER BY 子句中的参数从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection>分配给 OrderByParameters 属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.AutoGenerateOrderByClause%2A>

trans-unit.source: This eliminates the need to explicitly assign an ORDER BY clause to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 这消除了需要显式将分配到 ORDER BY 子句<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy%2A>

trans-unit.source: The construction of the ORDER BY clause from the OrderByParameters property requires that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A> property of the parameter in the collection identifies a single property of the item that is returned from the query.
trans-unit.target: 构造从 OrderByParameters 属性的 ORDER BY 子句的要求<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A>集合中参数的属性标识从查询返回的项的单个属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: The parameters that are used for creating the ORDER BY clause.
trans-unit.target: 用于创建 ORDER BY 子句的参数。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> creates an Entity SQL query that was specified during the configuration of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 之后，将会<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref>创建的配置期间指定的 Entity SQL 查询<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Applying LINQ Queries to EntityDataSource](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/cb70db56-9f9d-4b79-98fe-f03dd5ad1e38).

trans-unit.target: 这使你可以预测一组指定的属性从查询返回的对象。

trans-unit.source: This string is passed, without modification, to the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> that is executed by the [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/add/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此字符串而不进行修改，即传递到<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>通过执行[!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/add/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]。</xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>

trans-unit.target: 此查询是通过调整的数据源<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>

trans-unit.source: For examples of how to use the clause to define a projection for a query, see [How to: Execute a Query that Returns Anonymous Type Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/3b264025-e911-4d73-90ce-992d2b9d189d).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何使用子句定义查询投影的示例，请参阅[如何︰ 执行查询该返回匿名类型的对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/3b264025-e911-4d73-90ce-992d2b9d189d)。

trans-unit.source: Updates are not supported for projected data.
trans-unit.target: 投影的数据不支持更新。

trans-unit.source: This means that when you use the Select property to specify a projection, the bound data binding does not support updates.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着当你使用所选属性指定投影，绑定的数据绑定不支持更新。

trans-unit.source: When you define a projection with paging enabled, you must define the property by which to order the results.
trans-unit.target: 当使用启用的分页定义投影时，必须定义对结果进行排序依据的属性。

trans-unit.source: This means the when you set the Select property to defined a projection and have <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.AutoPage%2A> set to `true`, you must also set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy%2A> property to define the order or set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.AutoGenerateOrderByClause%2A> property to `true` and add an ORDER BY parameter to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderByParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着在你设置定义投影的选择属性，并且具有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.AutoPage%2A>设置为`true`，还必须设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy%2A>属性来定义的顺序或设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.AutoGenerateOrderByClause%2A>属性`true`和 ORDER BY 将参数添加到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderByParameters%2A>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderByParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.AutoGenerateOrderByClause%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.AutoPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: Select cannot be set if <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EnableUpdate%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EnableDelete%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EnableInsert%2A> is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果不能设置选择<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EnableUpdate%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EnableDelete%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EnableInsert%2A>已启用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EnableInsert%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EnableDelete%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EnableUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the Select is set to a query that returns a projection of properties (for example, `SELECT p.ProductID, p. Name FROM AdventureWorksEntities.Products AS p`), a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataRecord> will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择设置为返回的属性投影的查询 (例如， `SELECT p.ProductID, p. Name FROM AdventureWorksEntities.Products AS p`)、 一个<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataRecord>将返回。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataRecord>

trans-unit.source: The parameters that are used for creating the ORDER BY clause.

trans-unit.source: When the Select property specifies a query projection and the value of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EnableUpdate*>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EnableDelete*>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EnableInsert*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 当所选属性指定了查询投影和的值<> *1>， <> </> *1>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EnableInsert*>是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EnableInsert*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs after a query has been executed.
trans-unit.target: 执行查询后发生。

trans-unit.source: The Selected event is raised after a query has been executed and data has been returned.
trans-unit.target: 执行查询并返回数据后，将引发所选事件。

trans-unit.source: It is also raised if an error occurred during query preparation or execution.
trans-unit.target: 它也会引发如果查询准备或执行期间出错。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs.Results%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs> object contains an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> of objects that are returned from the query.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs.Results%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs>对象包含<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>的从查询返回的对象。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs.Results%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle the Selected event to retrieve and store returned entities in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 处理所选事件，以检索并将返回的实体存储在<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Do this to persist object changes on the page.
trans-unit.target: 这样做来持久保存在页上的对象更改。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs.TotalRowCount%2A>property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs> object shows the total number of objects in all pages, regardless of the values passed by the data-bound control for paging.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs.TotalRowCount%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs>对象显示在所有页中，而不考虑分页的数据绑定控件所传递的值的对象总数。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs.TotalRowCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs.TotalRowCount%2A>is only retrieved if the data-bound control needs it, such as if paging is enabled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs.TotalRowCount%2A>是仅检索如果数据绑定控件需要它，如启用分页。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs.TotalRowCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: If an error occurs when the query is prepared or executed, the Selected event is raised, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs.Exception%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs> object is set to the returned <xref:System.Exception>, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs.Results%2A> property is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果准备或执行查询时出错，将引发所选事件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs.Exception%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs>对象设置为返回<xref:System.Exception>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs.Results%2A>属性设置为`null`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs.Results%2A> </xref:System.Exception> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you handle the exception in the Selected event handler, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果处理所选事件处理程序中的异常，设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>属性`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: This prevents the exception from being raised again.
trans-unit.target: 这可防止再次引发异常。

trans-unit.source: When you specify a value of `false` for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> re-raises the exception.
trans-unit.target: 当指定的值`false`为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>重新引发异常。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs before a query is constructed and executed.

trans-unit.source: The Selecting event is raised before a query is constructed and executed.
trans-unit.target: 构造并执行查询之前，将引发选择事件。

trans-unit.source: Handle the Selecting event to modify the configuration of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> or read or change the arguments from the data-bound control before the query is constructed and executed.
trans-unit.target: 处理选择事件，以修改的配置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>或读取或更改数据绑定控件中的参数，构建并执行查询之前。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectingEventArgs> object to `true` to cancel the query.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectingEventArgs>对象传递给`true`以取消查询。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectingEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the SELECT operation is canceled, no data is returned to the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 取消选择操作时，没有数据返回到数据绑定控件。

trans-unit.source: If `AllowPaging` is set to `true` in the data-bound control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource> invokes the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Skip%2A> and <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Top%2A> query builder methods on <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> using the values of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果`AllowPaging`设置为`true`在数据绑定控件中，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>时，将调用<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Skip%2A>和<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Top%2A>上查询生成器方法<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>使用的值<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A> </xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> </xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Top%2A> </xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601.Skip%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource>

trans-unit.source: If `AllowSorting` is set to `true` in the data-bound control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A> of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object can be changed when the Selecting event is handled.
trans-unit.target: 如果`AllowSorting`设置为`true`在数据绑定控件中，<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A>的<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>处理选择事件时，可以更改对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A>

trans-unit.source: Any other query operators, such as WHERE or ORDER BY, that are specified in the page markup are applied after the Selecting event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 任何其他查询运算符，如 WHERE 或 ORDER BY、 页面标记中指定的应用后将引发选择事件。
